content.detailedDescription:
1. me and. my wife were in the bedroom when we heard a low pitch but still very noticeable humming sound. the sound went on for about 10 minutes before we got up to see what was going on outside. i discovered that my in laws had both been awakened by the sound. we stood outside waiting for the sound and when we heard it the entire sky lit up green for several seconds before fading away. my wife and father in law stood under the patio i stepped out in the yard and during the humming to look up, the entire sky was still green and several hundred feet above my was a extremely bright white light. my wife and i observed this once and my father in law observed it twice out of his window and once from the backyard. 

2. the humming sound. 

3. i have never seen anything like it. 

4.  it simply made a humming sound lit the entire sky up then stopped. did all of this 12:30-12:55

5. confused and fascinated. i am still waiting hoping the sound and lights will return so i can capture it on camera. 

6. it just disappeared.
content.summary: Loud humming then entire sky lights up green multiple times for several seconds

content.detailedDescription: I was on a ridge off of the industrial parkway in greenup with a friend when we noticed a noise that sounded similar to clapping a laughing right after that within seconds 3 similar shaped objects suddenly appear over a field a few hundred feet away they all glowed a off green color but it dissipated kinda like heat would. we could not come to a logical explanation of what it was one object landed and two other hovered one of the objects just vanished in no direction just disappeared and shortly after the second did the same when they disappeared it sounded like thunder or a bang we watched the other object on the ground we tried taking a picture but the phone went straight to static and as soon as i unlocked my phone the object took off directly straight up and it also sounded like a bang we left immediately towards i64 and by the time we came to the grayson exit we had to pull over and have had severe nausea and a fever since then my friend went to the kings daughters and i havent talked to her since then now as ive been typing this ive had diarrhea and a headache
content.summary: No way to give a short description.

content.detailedDescription: I was out on my front porch on the phone with my mother when i thought i saw a very pow helicopter just above the tree across the street. but as i looked harder i realized there was no sound! helicopters are extremly loud. it saw me when i saw it i walked doen my drive way as the small dark metal saturn like saucer met me half way down my driveway. it hoverd about 50ft in front and about 100 feet above me. i waved hi. i was not afraid at all. we just sat there for ten minutes looking at each other. then i guess he got bord with me staring at him and he slowly hovers away in the opposite direction. i watched it slowly move abovea man made lake it got to about a mile away maybe less and he just vanished and apparex in the horizon as an ord.At that moment my friend that was living down the street was coming to visit and he was looking at the same orb as me buy didn't seethe ship as i saw minutes before. it floated left to right left to right went higher and higher. then finally gets up so high he blended in with the stars.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Met eyes with small ship and it hoverd over to me and sat above me

content.detailedDescription: I walked outside to have a smoke when a outtake orb caught my eye. at first i thought it was a awesome mentor but it moved too slow and did not burn out,nor did it have a tail. picture a small sun that casts no light to the ground. the light continued for several minutes, getting smaller until blinking on the horizon and disappearing. it moved from the south west to the north or towards indianapolis. i listened hard but heard nothing though i live in a municipal area.The sky has a low haze, high humidity, and that might be what caused the blink but it is not the iss. use to live in ca and there was no trail, not a missile or a rocket. this is indiana and last time i checked we only sent missiles up from or across here at end of the world times. no news about nukes flying. this is my first ufo sighting. the feeling of realization was calm, matter of fact. as i worked the possibilities through i came to the realization that what i was seeing must be reported. hope more reports of tonight's events shed more details
content.summary: Orange ball moving through sky. not a meteorite, too slow. no plane lights.

content.detailedDescription: I was watching the airplane , that was going to worcester airport (i think) and i saw 2 lights in his way. they moved closer together, than to the side of the airplane, further  from each other, so airplane passed. thani noticed more  lights , they moved around in regards to each other, didn't form symmetric shape, and started moving all together at steady speed se. i ran home to get the camera, when i got back i could only see 1 small light , it lingered a little longer and disappeared. i took a picture of that 1 light
content.summary: 7 lights, 1 of them bigger with 2 smaller lights on opposite sides, another one a little smaller , the rest same size

content.detailedDescription: My granddaughter and i were laying outside, star watching.  suddenly, a triangular formation of 3 bright lights moved very quickly from south to north.  it was so much faster than an airplane, or the iss or a weather satellite.  it zipped across the sky.
content.summary: Triangular light formation moved south to north at a very rapid rate of speed.

content.detailedDescription: Bright object hovering over tower, with approximately 6 bright white lights. stationary for several minutes. video was bouncy because couldn't hold phone straight, but gives idea of how bright it was.
content.summary: Bright hovering object with 6 white lights. hovering over/near tower.

content.detailedDescription: Driving along hwy 370 right near the exit of elm st, i started noticing what appeared to be a dual sunrise coming from the northern sky.The sky was glowing red and orange just like a normal sunrise,although from the wrong direction. i also noticed what appeared to be two half orbs stationary on the very horizon. it was hard to judge how far away this glow and orbs were as i was driving and could not stop. as i proceeded to drive for a couple more minutes, i was able to look back at the same spot and whatever it was completely disappeared and the whole horizon was dark again. i find this a little strange as two years ago almost to the date as above incident, i experienced a mass ufo sighting in st.Charles in which i watched a literal space fleet for five full minutes coming from the southeast to northwest.They were as high up as satellites would be emanating a bright white light.
content.summary: Driving along hwy 370 sunday morning saw what appeared to be dual sunrise from the northern sky. drove for couple of minutes, looked back and whatever it was was completely gone.

content.detailedDescription: I was laying in bed and i had a window and an arch of a window on top of the window and one night i was looking out the arche and saw this huge beem of light fly by and it was super loud and at first i didn't think of anything i thought it was a plane but every night around the same time it would come closer and closer to my window and on the seventh day it was right outside my window and it went by fast and super loud.  the object was kinda circular with orange/ yelllw lights all around it. after the seventh day i was scared because i did research and saw that it might be a ufo. i lost sight of the object because it would go directly northwest in seconds.
content.summary: For a full week a ufo kept flyin by my window everyday it would get closer and closer

content.detailedDescription:
On a clear and sunny day, in broad daylight, on a very familiar road, while driving my car with some friends... what i can only describe as some kind of a "ball" of light (about the size of a large beachball) appeared, very suddenly, out of nowhere, directly in front of my car. 

in a bit of a panic, i asked my friends if they saw it too and they all definitely did. we were stunned and not sure what to do. 

it appeared to be floating/hovering/flying about 3 feet off the ground, and it was moving with us. there was no physical structure to it, as it appeared to be literally made of light. the light varied in color and was dynamic, not static. it was almost impossibly bright, like no other light source i've even seen, even though it was the middle of the day.

it appeared about 30 feet in front of my car, and it seemed to be matching my speed. i was going about 40 mph at first, but i slowed down a little bit, not wanting to drive into it... but it seemed to slow down with me, remaining the same distance ahead of us. then i sped up a little,  and it did the same thing, matching my speed and remaining directly in front of my car. and then... it just disappeared. 

it was only there for a few seconds... maybe 10 or 15 seconds... before it vanished, just as it had appeared, into thin air.

also: there were definitely other cars on the road with me that day too, both behind me and in the lanes next to me and slightly behind me, but i have no idea if anyone other than my friends and i saw it. 

this happened in a pre-iphone/smartphone/cameraphone world, so none of us got any photos or video. (the image i uploaded was created by me, years later, using photoshop and a screenshot from google street-view of about where it happened.)
content.summary: Driving with friends (they saw it too), about 40 feet in front of my car, a "ball" of light appeared, hovering just above the road directly in front of us. it paced us, remaining equidistant from us, despite my inconsistent speed. then it vanished.

content.detailedDescription: The object was very large dimensions. a high altitude. visible from neighboring cities
content.summary: Bright object with constant speed

content.detailedDescription: A straight line was moving without a voice, and in a moment and disappeared into the burning income.
content.summary: A straight line was moving without a voice, and in a moment and disappeared into the burning income.

content.detailedDescription:
Unknown bright star-like object in bandar abbas sky
seen by people
content.summary: Unknown bright star-like object in bandar abbas sky

content.detailedDescription: Sphere metallic object. not on water but above the loch would say few feet above water in air. none moving was stationary no wobbling or floating just still. was a nice clear day. between 3 miles away. size of golf ball to me. waited 15 mins. had to leave as i was doing a driving job. this was my run every twice a week at time. never seen it before or since. on way back two hours later stopped at same place. it wasn't there anymore. very bizzare. had mobile at time but no camera phone. not sure if phones had cameras back in 2000. anyway that's my story. just curious of what it could have been.
content.summary: Metalic, sphere.

content.detailedDescription:
Ice fishing at round lake saskatchewan, took pic of clouds, did not notice orb at the time.
when i first saw the pic, i knew it was an orb. bluish white in color. took pic with iphone 6.
have seen a few strange objects in the sky since i moved here 10 years ago. not sure if this could be lens flare?
content.summary: Ice fishing with daughter, snapped pic of clouds, did not see orb at the time

content.detailedDescription: Driving south east on 72 nearing 28. a yellowish orange circle light apeared in the sky ahead of my car and split into two circle lights. then a third apeared below it and split leaving 4 lights. all 4 disapeared then one reapeared heading to my right and disapeared and reapeared again then vanished and one did the same to  left. then all vanished. then observed many flashing star like balls. after turning left on 28 heading into leeseburg,  i observed a large fireball with trail glowing orange then vanished. as i parked at my destination i heard fighter jets over head leaving the area in teams of 2. my husband witnessed this as well.
content.summary: Ufo leeburg ohio on 72 south. lights apeared and disapeared thefireball  apeared with trail.

content.detailedDescription:
Approximate section of sky where observed is:
lat 38.739 long -90.6141

time and date are approximate.  

i was outside at the time smoking a cigarette.  i looked up to watch the stars.  i saw what seemed to be a plane or satellite with 3 lights; one on each corner.

it moved northwest to southwest in what seemed the speed of an airplane, then seemed to stop overhead.  it seemed to hover or remain stationary at the point in the sky above me.  the object did not seem to change its altitude and was very far above, possibly in space or the upper atmosphere.

due to light pollution and cloudiness, i could not make out anymore than the lights which were roughly on each corner of an isosceles triangle shape, which was dark and scarcely visible. 

i felt sort of odd, and the sighting took me a while to mentally process, and days before i decided to search the area for reports and ultimately file this one.  

i walked back inside at the time and forgot about it, but it's been in the back of my mind since i sighted it.  i have told no one of the incident until now.

the attached screenshot is approximately the section of sky where the object was observed.
content.summary: Triangle-shaped object, no true outline observed, a light on each corner.

content.detailedDescription: I was standing in front of dining area talking to my wife on the phone. i noticed a light gliding across the horizon. at first it looked like a helicopter but i noticed that there were no body of aircraft, only the light. it shot 3 wide light beams that flew forward than upwards total length of perhaps several hundred feet. then it continued on it's path and i lost the sight of it. i was stunned and excited at the same time.
content.summary: Observed like strong headlights, but no object that shot 3 light beams which flew straight that turned upwards

content.detailedDescription: Nous ã©tions une gang de jeunes qui sâ€™amusait sur le gazon de l'ã©cole, on faisais de la gymnastique.Moi jâ€™ã©tais sur le dos et j'aidais a mes amis a faire une pirouette. c'est a ce moment la que j'ai aperã§u l'ovni.Quand il a disparu en passant au dessus de l'ã©cole, nous avons fait le tour de celle-ci pour voir ou il allait. il avait disparu. nous avons penser qu'il pouvait avoir atterri sur le toit et nous somme montã© sur le toit pour voir mais rien.
content.summary: L'objet est passer en silence au dessus de la rue ou nous ã©tions.

content.detailedDescription: I had just finished work, went to have a smoke in the back yard and was immediately distracted by a large glowing orange star shaped object. it had my undivided attention as living not far from heathrow airport and working on the doorstep of the airport, i immediately knew this was not something that i had ever seen and instinctively knew this was not from this 'earth'. i started recording on my i-phone immediately, and just watched in amazement at its strange behaviour. although it moved erratically and made very sharp movements there was almost method to its movement. a silver(whitish) beam kept emanating from it every minute or so. i was glued to it for a few minutes but i then went inside to wake up my brother , but as i was watching it from the back room , it quickly descended, behind the parks where the church tower seemed to be and then vanished from plain sight. however i was now inside , but as it descended there was some sort of noise ,perhaps some sort of 'mechanical vibration'. i have shown my family the video , and a few friends , everyone is as baffled as i am. i will upload the video and perhaps with your expertise some sort of explanation can be reached. the exact time will be on my i-phone.
content.summary: Finished work late, i was having a smoke, in the garden and was glued to this large glowing object beheaving erratically.

content.detailedDescription: Went outside to set up my telescope (schmidt-cassegrain type, orion star-seeker iv 127mm with 10mm 62 degree lens). first warm night of the year for observing and i had much to see. was out just a minute when i observed star-like objects. i saw 4 objects this evening, all pseudo-stars, all white and of magnitude +3 to +2. here i report mainly the details of the second object i saw (the 229nd object i have seen in the last two years). i spotted the first two objects near the cup of the big dipper. object #2 was moving from east to northwest, came from behind the cup, passed through the cup and stopped a few degrees west of it. at 7:51pm a plane few from west to northeast. two additional star-like objects came out of nowhere from the north and came within ten degrees of the plane. object #2 moved south a few degrees, also toward the plane. after the plane was gone, the two additional objects disappeared in the north; object #1 stay positioned in front of the cup. object #2, a yellowish-white pseudo-star, about +2 mag., moved eastward back through the cup, then curved southeast along ursa major until it reached the area of the real star alpha lin (lynx). the pseudo-star stopped there at 8:06 pm and remained stationary for almost ten minutes. i turned the telescope on the object, it was yellow-golden yellow, about +3.5 mag., but shining brightly compared to the stars in the immediate area. in the telescope i viewed a curved line of 7 stars. the object moved to three different positions along that line: it was close to alpha lyn but was not at it. once when the object dimmed i could see the dark, grayish outline of a craft through the telescope; most times it looked spherical though light often reflected to a more cylindrical shape. at 8:13pm the object dimmed out completely to the naked eye. at 8:14pm it brightened to about +2.5, moving southward along the line of stars in the telescope. i pointed my orange light at the object and it moved about 5 degrees toward me, then returned to its position. at 8:18 pm another plane flew within 20 degrees of the star-like object, and as the plane neared, the object "elevated" by 15 degrees to "plane level." it came within a few degrees of the plane, then returned to its position at alpha lin at 8:22pm. this object #2 covered a total of about 40 degrees of the sky. at 8:45 pm i had to leave (without getting my astronomy done!). the final location of the object was still near alpha lin, approximately 30 degrees northwest of regulus, behind the head of leo. see attached star chart for simpler explanation.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Observed 4 white pseudo-stars moving around and watching aircraft in the area of ursa major.

content.detailedDescription: A silver ball that looks orange on the pic i took.  snow melted under its flight path.  went slow.  you can see sun also reflecting on power pole support cables.  my son and grandson have seen them too over green lake in spicer about three miles away.  then it just disappeared.  saw a triangular craft as well but the pic i took of it vanished from the camera somehow...
content.summary: Silver ball reflected orange

content.detailedDescription: Went outside and was setting up astronomy binoculars on a tripod when i noticed over my head a white star-like object, about +2 magnitude, moving slowly southward from west of auriga, about 80 degrees elevated. it continued to move slowly southward, about 40 degrees until it was about parallel in the sky with rigel (in orion), and still high in the sky, ten degrees from zenith. it came to a stop, dimmed, then dimmed out all together for a few seconds. it appeared again, dim white, then it became orange, reversed direction and moved about ten degrees north (toward me). (note: i have noticed with these types of objects that velocity and luminosity varies directly; color changes are no accident.) the pseudo-star then reversed direction again, moving southward, back to where it was. it was positioned about twenty degrees southwest of the pleiades and 35 degrees from rigel. this is nearly the position of menkar (cetus). after this point, either the object remained in front of menkar, or dimmed out and disappeared. there was no more movement for the next hour when menkar moved out of my viewing area. menkar is a giant red class star; what i saw in that position with my binoculars was yellow.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: White pseudo-star moved 40 degrees across sky, along auriga to orion

content.detailedDescription: I was looking for my cat. and noticed yellow lights coming from a tree line heading towards the planes leaving atlanta international. i just moved here from san diego, cal, and i know aviation, its my life, i have been been flying hang gliders and ultralights my entire life. i have 30 rc planes, etc. i know what i saw. there was 30 or 40 lights coming from the tree line in front of my house and they where heading right towards the planes leaving atlanta, i know because i sit and watch them all day. these things were flying right threw them and then went right up into to space. just -please call me and i will explain.  jeff
content.summary: I saw 30 or 40 ufos going right over my house.

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting on my balcony at my home address having a coffee as i was drawn to go.Oitsoee and get some air 

i often watch the planes blinking and can hear them. we are on the heathrow flight path i think. i am from new zealand and adore the night sky back home but on london not so much as it is so light polluted. last night was particularly clear and i could see some tiny stars. i felt like it was very still and something was different. hard to explain. more of a sense. i looked to my right and saw the brightest lights so i just sat and watched. i realised it wasn't moving at all. just sitting there. i could see what looked like six lights surrounding the outside and with nothing solid in the middle. i kept thinking it was moving further back and then back to the original position but i wasn't sure. it would look like a brihht ball and then the lights were distinctive. i asked my husband to come outside as i wanted to make sure i wasn't imagining it. i asked him to look and he immediately said oh my god that's so brihht and it looks like a bunch of the brightest stars. he kept asking me if i thought i was changing shape and i was relieved it wasn't just me. the planes were flying past and i realised that where the pkanes were meant the object was much higher than the planes. it made no noise. i decided to try and take some photos with my iphone. i took a couple and then zoomed in and realised that it might be something different to what i was seeing. my logical brain was telling me it was a weather balloon or a satellite but i couldn't quite believe it was as somehow i just knee it wasn't. the object moved to the right slowly slowly as i had to move along my balcony and lean out whereas when i first saw it i was seated but it didn't move quickly or even look like it was moving - more like it was just quietly sitting and hovering. 

i felt mesmerised and fascinated and for some reason extremely happy yet emotional. i cried like somehow it knew i was watching and i felt good about that. that makes me sound like a total crazy person and i assure you i'm not. i don't have a better camera so only have my iphone so did the best i could. when it mover further back it became more of a ball of brihht brihht light and then when it came closer i could see all the lights on the outside. 

i watched it until.Thr lights just suddenly went out and i watched for another ten or so minutes but it didn't come back. it was like it turned its lights off and just vanished. i have never seen anything like it in my life. i can't compare it to anything.
content.summary: Sitting outside and looked up and saw the brightest light i have ever seen in the sky

content.detailedDescription: it was about 5 minutes after midnight and i was watching a movie seated in the living room.  i had all the lights off except for the tv.  i have a big picture window, and i was looking out the window when i saw it.  at first i thought maybe it was a meteor, but since when are they green?  it looked like a giant egg and was white, appeared to have a tail, and was glowing green all around it.  it was moving slower than a meteor or falling star - seemingly deliberately slower.  there are trees around that blocked my view once the object fell below a certain point, but it appeared that it could have been landing.  the shape, the size of it - it seemed quite large - and the color - plus the way it was moving - these things are what struck me the most.  i don't think i will ever forget it.  i wish i could have gone out and investigated; maybe i would have if i could have seen exactly where it appeared to land.
content.summary: Looked like a giant egg, white, glowing green outline around it; had tail of same color.  moved much slower than a falling star or meteor.  could have landed; too many trees to see for sure.

content.detailedDescription: I saw a bright object that i thought was a star at first, because it looked similar to the other star that i was looking at in size and glow. but looking at it for longer it was a slightly different shape, almost like a beaker, and it had a small beam pointing upwards coming from it. it moved very slowly horizontally away from the other star. way too slow to be a plane, and the glowing white light was a solid constant light, never flashed it just remained glowing. once it got a little ways away from the star, and very very slowly, it started to move upwards. it got a little ways up and then a cloud rolled over both it and the star. i couldn't see the star from the cloud coverage but i could still see the glow from the object through the cloud. the brightness faded slightly, and didn't move too far above the height of the other star before i had to go inside because i felt a bit scared.
content.summary: Witnessed a small starlike object that put out a beam and changed direction

content.detailedDescription: A week before i sean  flying a star not inusual .After ufo  appearance ouer dog did not want to go in garded for pee and poo 3 days 3 nights.Dog was looking at the window all dhe time barking ol the time ,there was nothing there i checkt .I heard the strange noys in the garden, scraching , i tried to film and record it with my phone, but my phone stopped work .Screen went wight and newer ben fixt.Sorry for spelling mistakes .
content.summary: Orange .White, blinking ,black ball

content.detailedDescription: I just had an odd, unexplained experience. i came home after dark and went outside to my back deck to turn on a light so that i could take the dogs out. as i rounded the corner there was a very close, bright flash of red light accompanied by a sound that i could only describe as a muted whip. it was as if something was out there and i startled it so it shut down. it made the hair on the back of neck stood on end for a few minutes. i live in the country where it is very dark and this light and sound cannot be explained by anything in the natural surroundings. also, this flash of light occurred within 15 feet of where i was standing.
content.summary: Tonight i witnessed a bright flash of red light accompanied by a sound that i could only describe as a muted whip. this was observed in my backyard and there was nothing that could account for it.

content.detailedDescription:
We were observing planes landing and taking off at mccarren airport from the 23rd floor of new york new york hotel (corner of tropicana ave. and las vegas blvd.) at about an hour after dark, and saw a group of over 12 lights rise from what appeared to be just above ground level near eastern ave. & tropicana ave. they rose and moved slightly northeast where they were observed to be dancing in the sky. (this was between the airport and nellis afb.)  their movements were quick and jerky, not like any known aircraft. they moved so fast that it was impossible to count an exact number of objects.  after a couple of minutes their lights seemed to dim and fade away as if they were moving away from us in an easterly direction. before, during, and after this viewing, planes were still observed landing at the airport.
when i first saw the objects, i didn't think about "what" they were, i was just concentrating on the beautiful and intriguing "dance" that they were performing. after a minute or so, my husband and i realized that it couldn't be any aircrafts that we know of, and it dawned on us that it must be some sort of ufo or orbs. i had a peaceful feeling due to the beauty of the "dance".
content.summary: Group of 12+ lights rose from near ground and danced in the sky north of mccarren airport.
